title: Product Discovery Platform
description: Research-driven platform that helped a fintech startup validate market fit and accelerate MVP delivery.
aboutClient: Early-stage fintech startup focused on digital banking solutions
problemStatement: Client needed to validate product-market fit before investing in full-scale development
ourSolution: Built a research-driven discovery platform with rapid prototyping capabilities and integrated user feedback systems
resultsAndOutcomes: Reduced time-to-MVP by 40%, validated core assumptions with 500+ users, secured Series A funding

title: Scalable Commerce API
description: Headless commerce API built for high throughput, reducing latency and improving checkout conversion.
aboutClient: Mid-sized e-commerce company processing 10M+ transactions annually
problemStatement: Legacy system couldn't handle traffic spikes, causing lost sales during peak seasons
ourSolution: Developed a headless commerce API with microservices architecture, implementing caching and load balancing
resultsAndOutcomes: 99.9% uptime, 60% reduction in latency, 25% increase in checkout conversion rate

title: Enterprise Data Pipeline
description: Robust ETL pipeline that unified analytics and slashed reporting time from hours to minutes.
aboutClient: Fortune 500 enterprise with distributed data sources across 20+ countries
problemStatement: Data silos prevented real-time decision making, manual reporting took 8+ hours
ourSolution: Implemented automated ETL pipeline with real-time data integration and unified analytics dashboard
resultsAndOutcomes: Real-time reporting (under 5 minutes), 95% reduction in manual work, data accuracy improved to 99.8%
